column1: Smoque BBQ////The sliced brisket sandwich was good
column4: just good. The portion size of beef was very small considering what the sandwich cost. I was expecting a pile of meat but the two halfs of the bun were touching each other. Meaning not much meat was between the bread. The beans really were not that great
column5: kind of watery with an addition of the bbq sauce which again made for an off flavor.
